name: asdf
description: Extendable version manager with support for Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Erlang & more
install: asdf_dir="${ASDF_DIR:-"$HOME/.asdf"}"; mkdir -p "$asdf_dir" && cp -R * "$asdf_dir"/ && echo ''; echo 'Add the following:'; echo '. "$asdf_dir/asdf.sh"'; echo '. "$asdf_dir/completions/asdf.bash"'; echo 'to your .bashrc (or .bash_profile) file and then launch new shell'
